reviewText: Level 2 - I still don't feel any different. My reiki is still ordinary, and my Pranic Healing is still getting better and better. I still think it comes from within (or without, maybe it's Karmic). But still a disappointment not seeing Steve doing the symbols on the screen. Maybe that's a conscious motivator.

reviewText: As I have said before I am Reiki Master and use these programs for my students.  This one besides the wonderful attunenent, is very good with showing the Reiki Symbols and how to use them. As I stated on my Reiki Master review, some Reiki Masters might be unhappy with this program for the same reasons as I stated.  Second level Reiki can cost $250.00 on up.  depending on the Reiki Master.  Getting an attunement in person is great also. Program gives you an option if you can't receive an attunement in person...or maybe cannot afford it.peace

reviewText: After receiving the 1st Level Attunement from Steve Murrays Reiki 1st Level Attunement on DVD I couldn't wait to move to the 2nd Level. Watching the DVD for the first time was a life altering experience as was watching the 1st Level DVD.  Anyone watching this DVD with the intent to receive the Attunement receives it along with so much more. I highly recommend this DVD. Even if you never did Reiki, I believe that this is an experience everyone should have in there life. The world would certainly be a better place for it. By continually viewing this, I openend myself to inner growth that never ceases to flow into and through me from the Higher Power. You won't be sorry you got this DVD.

reviewText: Since I bought and took Steve's entire course, my review for Vol. 2 will read close to my review for Vol. 1 - due to having the same great experience with ALL his books and DVD's.  I have studied Reiki with teachers in person and online for over 10 years.  THIS DVD, as the first one did also, were some of the first times I found myself trusting in the process of energy passing from one moment to another for the sake of "attunement" or the like.  There was something magickal about the idea that I had to trust in this process due to it being a DVD and not a human standing right next to me.  Most humans charge an arm and a leg simply to stand there anyway - and not much can happen that way either.  And I found no difference in learning the first set of symbols from a DVD and Book Course, than I did from a person in the same room as me.  EXCEPT that with Steve's course - I felt more connected to this learning.  IS that his personal energy attached to his course, I don't know?  I would think so, he is open, honest and straight forward to teaching the wonders of Reiki.  It's true, not all people are going to have the same wonderful experience that I [and others] did.  This is simply what Reiki is all about, each of us having a togetherness connection to the Reiki Energy source itself, while ALSO having our own experiences learning about how to harness and use it.  This is what I've learned most from Steve; his books and DVD's have opened my heart and mind like no other Reiki teacher I've worked with.  I'm very happy I bought and took his courses.
summary: A great way to continue your growth in Reiki.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I would highly recommend for anyone interested and/or curious to prayerfully consider this 2nd level attunement.  It's a big step and, imo, shouldn't be done until completion of the 1st level attunement and yes, even completing the 21 day cleansing period.  But each person must decide for themselves.  I'm just telling you what worked for me.  After learning the first level, you naturally want to do hands-on work, even if it is just on yourself or a pet.  I remember falling into what I now know, from outside reading, to be Reiki sleep. This is common in first level self treatments in my case.  After the 2nd level attunement, I wanted so much to share Reiki on others and felt a higher vibration of healing in myself when working with others than in self treatments.  Obviously you don't go up and ask people if you can do Reiki, but your child or spouse or close friend, yes.  I have in my reviews of the attunements so far, shared a part of the experience.  So here goes: after receiving the attunement, I remember discerning a feeling I've never experienced before that is very hard to verbalize now actually.  A feeling of simultaneous humility and thankfulness circulating throughout my entire being.  If you have studied chakras and/or auras, I could also explain it as any leaks or gray, smokey areas all dissipating and being exchanged with bright, bold colors--regenerating me with basically the rainbow of chakras and surrounding me (the aura) in the full ranges/spectrums of light, especially gold encircling my body.  I wish more people would open themselves up to this ancient hands-on healing art of the healing power of God's free love and compassion poured out on us in a tangible way that so many are seeking these days. So for those wanting to believe but having trouble, I think Reiki could open that door you want to enter but until now, haven't been able to.  Yes, I believe Reiki can open doors that will lead you where you want to be and where, for the greatest good and to put you on the path of excellence, your destiny awaits you.  I don't know where you are in your faith but this has done wonders for mine.  This is an amazing price for something that back "in the day" costed 10,000 dollars per attunement.  There should be no secrets or price tags on healing.  It is a free gift of God--the Source--to those that wish to accept/receive it.  God bless Steve for following his heart and producing this series. Many will be blessed because of it.  Reiki can do no wrong.  It only works for your greatest good. o8ESoar!
summary: Each level takes you higher and you can share this with all you will.  Great for those entering the medical field!

reviewText: I discovered a whole new world through Reiki. Steve talks and walks us through each step, so that anyone can receive his Attunements with ease.  Following the Reiki Level 1 Attunement, I felt a mild yet powerful energy as I was channeling (or giving) Reiki to my wife while she was in labor just a few days later. She tells me that her pain was greatly diminished and she did have the baby quite easily for a very petite woman. Unbelievable!  THEN, I ordered the Reiki Level 2 and Reiki Master Attunements just days after that and have been channeling Reiki to my wife, newborn girl and myself every week.  This Level 2 Attunement will GREATLY increase anyone's Reiki using Usui Reiki symbols, and this DVD makes them accessible to anyone at Level 1.  I recommend ALL of Steve Murray's DVDs, which have changed my life - literally improving my quality of life, as well as that of my family and friends!  Steve's Reiki Healing Attunement and Reiki Psychic Attunement DVDs are priceless.  The incredible insight that you gain form the Psychic Attunement is phenomenal.  And with the Healing Attunement, after a brief yet well-spoken explanation and a few simple to follow instructions, anyone can receive Steve's Reiki healing energy right now!  Enough cannot be said about Steve Murray's amazing Attunements.
summary: Increase your Reiki NOW with this DVD from Steve Murray!

reviewText: Steve Murray's Reiki Attunement DVD programs are very well done. He takes the Reiki student from Level I to Master Attunements in easy to follow steps. The Reiki Level II Atttunement DVD is just as powerful as an Attunement in person. Steve patiently explains the process, the symbols, their importance, and takes the viewer through the Level II Attunement. This is a great resource to those that don't have access or money to go to a local Reiki Master for their Attunements.When my sister and I watched the Reiki Level I, II, and Master attunement DVD's, Both of us could feel the power of the attunements, and commented to each other,that we could feel heat and tingling in our hands.Buy this DVD and feel the heat!
